page.title: 08"Up the Down"-a walk
page.content: Start your walk on the beach(585809) where you can see a gift shop,beach huts,{Fisherman's Cottage},the pier and many people walking about Shanklin.The sea wall is made of many interesting stones.Above the beach is {Rylestone Gardens}which has a cafe.Many Shanklin hotels are near these gardens.You can continue your walk on the Luccombe Road where we saw the Margaret Passmore Theatre and Upper Chine School. Opposite the school is a recreation field called Big Meade and close by a 14th century church called St. Blasius.Cross over a stile by the church and start your walk through some fields up to a steep cliff and on to{Shanklin}Down.From the top,you will have a good view of Culver Cliff and Sandown Bay and the surrounding countryside(568802).
